content: this is the pattern i used for a specific jar i had from a 420 purchase the number of row and stitches will vary based on your jar diameter and height as well as the hook size and yarn type used… the jar pictures was 2 1/8 in diameter and 2 1/2 in from bottom of jar to bottom of jar lid and i used worsted ish weight yarn and a 4 00mm g hook **you will need ** -yarn -recommended hook for yarn used -stitch/round markers -tapestry needle -scissors -jar or at least the dimensions of the jar you are making it for
